snippet.title: Organs Please — New Trailer
snippet.description:
Hello, overseer! 

The Human Survival Committee has done an impressive job updating the Factory's software, if we do say so ourselves. You will be able to exceed your daily quote and work far more effectively. We have also provided the citizens of Vertical-5 with humanitarian aid and supplied them with Government-approved clothes and necessities.

We will host an Open Doors Day at the Factory soon. Everyone will have a chance to get acquainted with the Overseer's work and contribute to the noble cause of saving mankind from annihilation.

It is highly recommended that you add Organs Please to your Steam Wishlist, unless you want to be recycled.

Sincerely,
State Vigilance Committee

Get on Steam - https://bit.ly/3NT5lpA
